article: rwe gas ag , the german energy giant , is offering to end an eu antitrust probe into its marketing practices by selling off its high-pressure transmission network to anyone not involved in generating or supplying power , the european commission said friday .
abstract: germany s rwe offers to settle gas antitrust case
